programs.name: Apriltag Rig Calibration
programs.description: Solves an apriltag rig from data collected with capture_video_dataset

programs.name: Base-to-Camera Calibration
programs.description: Solves a base_pose_camera and other base calibration parameters from an apriltag rig and data collected with capture_video_dataset

programs.name: Capture Video Dataset
programs.description: Capture video segments, for use in other programs

programs.name: Create Video Dataset
programs.description: Create video dataset from mp4s, for use in other programs

programs.name: Intrinsics Calibration
programs.description: Calibrates camera intrinsics from data collected with create_video_dataset

programs.name: Detect Apriltags
programs.description: Given a video dataset, this runs apriltag detection on each image. Discards existing apriltag detections.

programs.name: Multi View Apriltag Rig Calibration
programs.description: Solves a multiview apriltag rig from data collected with capture_video_dataset
